 " One ", " Two ", " Three ", " Four ", " Five ", " Six ", " Seven ", " Eight ", " Nine ".

  arr = {2, 1, 1, 4, 5, 8, 2, 3}   
        -> sort arr -> {1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8} 
        -> reverse arr -> {8, 5, 4, 3, 2, 2, 1, 1}
  return {"Eight", "Five", "Four", "Three", "Two", "Two", "One", "One"}

  If the vector is empty, return an empty vector:
  arr = {}
  return {}

vector<string> by_length(vector<int> arr){
  vector<string> result;
  map<int,string> m;
  for(int i=0;i<arr.size();i++){
    if(m.find(arr[i])!=m.end()){
      m[arr[i]]=m[arr[i]]+" "+to_string(i);
    }else{
      m[arr[i]]=to_string(i);
    }
  }
  for(auto it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++){
    result.push_back(it->second);
  }
  return result;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Create a function that return true if the final quality 
 of a give string embody an alphabetic character and is not 
 a share of a word, and fake differently. 
 Note: " news " is a group of characters separated by distance.

Examples:
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pie")  false
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pi e")  true
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pi e ")  false
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("")  false 
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
bool check_if_last_char_is_a_letter(string txt){
    bool last_char_is_a_letter = false;
    for(int i=txt.length()-1;i>=0;i--){
        if(txt[i]>='a' && txt[i]<='z'){
            last_char_is_a_letter = true;
            break;
        }
    }
    return last_char_is_a_letter;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Return vector of all prefix from shortest to longest of the input chain
>>> all_prefixes("abc")
{"a", "ab", "abc"}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
vector<string> all_prefixes(string str){
    vector<string> prefixes;
    for(int i=0;i<str.size();i++){
        for(int j=i;j<str.size();j++){
            prefixes.push_back(str.substr(i,j-i));
        }
    }
    return prefixes;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Return vector of premier factors of give integer in the ordering from smallest to big. 
 Each of the factors should be vectored number of times represent to how many times it appear in factorization. 
 remark number should be adequate to the product of all factors
>>> factorize(8)
{2, 2, 2}
>>> factorize(25)
{5, 5}
>>> factorize(70)
{2, 5, 7}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> factorize(int n){
    vector<int> factors;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        for(int j=1;j<=i;j++){
            if(n%i==0){
                factors.push_back(i);
                factors.push_back(j);
                factors.push_back(n/i);
                factors.push_back(n/j);
            }
        }
    }
    return factors;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
For a given string, throw lowercase character to uppercase and uppercase to lowercase.
>>> flip_case("Hello")
"hELLO"
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string filp_case(string str){
    string str1;
    for(int i=0;i<str.size();i++){
        if(str[i]>='a' && str[i]<='z'){
            str1[i]=str[i]-'a'+1;
        }
        else if(str[i]>='A' && str[i]<='Z'){
            str1[i]=str[i]-'A'+1;
        }
        else{
            str1[i]=str[i];
        }
    }
    return str1;
}

double poly(vector<double> xs, double x){
    /* 
    Evaluates polynomial with coefficient xs at point x. return xs[0] + xs[1] * x + xs[1] * x^2 +.... xs[n] * x^n 
     * / 
     double sum=0;
     int i;
     for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
     { 
         sum+=xs[i]*pow(x,i);
     } 
     return sum;
}

double find_zero(vector < double > xs){
     / * 
     xs are coefficients of a polynomial. find_zero detect x such that poly(x) = 0. find_zero render merely entirely zero compass point, even if there be many. 
     Moreover, find_zero merely film list xs having even number of coefficients and big non zero coefficient as it guarantee a solution.
    >>> round(find_zero([1, 2]), 2) #f(x) = 1 + 2x 
    -0.5 
    >>> round(find_zero([-6, 11, -6, 1]), 2) # (x - 1) * (x - 2) * (x - 3) = -6 + 11x - 6x^2 + x^3 
    1.0
    */
     double sum=0;
     int i;
     for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
     { 
         sum+=xs[i]*pow(x,i);
     } 
     if (sum==0){
         return 0;
     }
     else{
         return xs[xs.size()-1]/sum;
     }
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Insert a number "delimeter" between every two consecutive component of input vector `numbers"
>>> intersperse({}, 4)
{}
>>> intersperse({1, 2, 3}, 4)
{1, 4, 2, 4, 3}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> intersperse(vector<int> numbers, int delimeter){ 
    vector<int> result;
    for(int i = 0; i < numbers.size(); i++){
        result.push_back(numbers[i]);
        if(i!= numbers.size()-1){
            result.push_back(delimeter);
        }
    }
    return result;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Return true is vector elements are monotonically increasing or decrease.
>>> monotonic({1, 2, 4, 20})
true
>>> monotonic({1, 20, 4, 10})
false
>>> monotonic({4, 1, 0, -10})
true
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
bool monotonic(vector<float> l){
    float min = l[0];
    float max = l[0];
    for(int i = 1; i < l.size(); i++){
        if(l[i] < min){
            min = l[i];
        }
        if(l[i] > max){
            max = l[i];
        }
    }
    if(min == max){
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
vector<float> derivative(vector<float> xs){

<|endoftext|>/*
From a given vector of integer, generate a vector of rolling maximal chemical element find until give moment 
 in the succession.
>>> rolling_max({1, 2, 3, 2, 3, 4, 2})
{1, 2, 3, 3, 3, 4, 4}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> rolling_max(vector<int> numbers){
    vector<int> result;
    int max_element=numbers[0];
    for(int i=0;i<numbers.size()-1;i++){
        if(numbers[i]>max_element){
            max_element=numbers[i];
        }
    }
    result.push_back(max_element);
    for(int i=0;i<numbers.size()-1;i++){
        if(numbers[i]>max_element){
            int temp=numbers[i];
            numbers[i]=numbers[i+1];
            numbers[i+1]=temp;
        }
    }
    return result;
}

Given a map, return truthful if all keys be chain in humble 
 font or all key are strings in upper case, else return false. 
 The function should return false is the afford function is empty.
Examples:
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"b","banana"}}) should return true.
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"A","banana"}, {"B","banana"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"8","banana"}, {"a","apple"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"Name","John"}, {"Age","36"}, {"City","Houston"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"STATE","NC"}, {"ZIP","12345"} }) should return true.
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
bool check_dict_case(map<string,string> dict){
    map<string,string>::iterator it;
    for(it=dict.begin();it!=dict.end();it++){
        if(it->second.size()==0){
            return false;
        }
        else if(it->second.size()==1){
            if(it->second[0]==it->first[0]){
                return true;
            }
        }
        else{
            string temp;
            for(unsigned int i=0;i<it->second.size();i++){
                temp+=it->second[i];
            }
            if(temp.size()==it->second.size()){
                for(unsigned int i=0;i<temp.size();i++){
                    if(temp[i]!=it->second[i]){
                        return false;
                    }
                }
                return true;
            }
        }
    }
    return false;
}
